Thing i want to improve for stage

Although I don’t have any concrete experience in mobile app development yet, it’s a field that attracts me strongly. I am overflowing with ideas for personal projects that I would like to turn into applications. I am fascinated by the ergonomics and practicality of these tools, as well as their omnipresence in our daily lives. I look forward to learning the skills to turn my ideas into functional and aesthetic applications, and thus contribute to this ever-changing universe.
